subject: Re: The truth about reaching out to brands (It's not what you think) ✨
Re: The truth about reaching out to brands (It's not what you think) ✨
body:
PARA
El El jue, 22 may 2025 a las 20:00, Fiona Frills <fiona@hey.influencerinsider.club> escribió:
Hey!
I want to share something that I wish I knew a longgg time ago…
And its about reaching out to brands
Let’s be real, none of us want to reach out to brands.
It takes time, it feels weird, and it even be kinda scary.
I used to think "why would i reach out to brands when they should reach out to me?".
I'll let you in on a little known industry secret:
Even the biggest influencers HAVE to do outreach!! (i'm talking millions of followers)🧍‍♀️
Shocker, right??!
The only difference is they have a manager that does it for them...
Now, eventually you will get a manager (i believe in youu!)
But in the meantime, you need someone or yourself to be reaching out to brands to grow your portfolio...
I’m not going to say that brands won't reach out to you, because they will, and it's a great feeling!!
However, 90% of the time when a brand reaches out to you, they offer horrible rates, ask you for way too much, and overall are just a headache. (TRUST ME, i've had too many to count)…
The ABSOLUTE best way to grow your account and portfolio will be reaching to brands yourself.
You set the rates, how much work you have to do, and become your own boss.
If this sounds like you, then
click here.
You will also learn everything about the process, so when you do get a manager, you will be able to tell if they know what they are doing or if they are scamming you. (happens much more than you would think)!!
Maybe you already know the importance of reaching out to brands, and if you do I highly suggest grabbing influencer insider, as I teach you the method no one is sharing, to gain access to DECISION MAKERS at these big companies!!
Andy from customer service that manages
hi@rhode.com
doesn't care about your videos (Andy's a hater anyway) but the director of marketing?! you KNOW she does, or she better…
Look my point is that you need to be contacting brands and you NEED to be contacting the RIGHT people at these brands. Otherwise it's just sending emails into a black hole.
5 - 10 emails sent to the right person could be difference between you and a $3000 deal. that's how fast it can change!!! 🤭
If you want to grow your portfolio and get paid faster than anyone you know, then this is for you.
In influencer insider i teach you everything about how to find the RIGHT people & their emails.
Not only that, but how to write an email that will get replies.
I’ve read literally thousands of emails sent to Frilliance and I can tell you first hand which ones worked and which ones didn’t make the cut.
Girls that have joined influencer insider have reached out to brands with what I taught them and have received replies from major brands already.
Glow recipe, Skims, Glossier, just to name a few. :)
This stuff WORKS.
Learn How to Find the Right People
I PROMISE you it will save you hours (probably days lol) and get you so much closer to where you deserve to be!!!
Unsubscribe

subject: Re: I put together something for you (300+ brands + my PR system) 📦✨
body:
Hello,
Thank you for reaching out. We would love to collaborate with you. We charge a $500 flat rate plus commissions for collaborations. This $500 flat rate will include your choice of one of these two types of videos.
1. Detail shots of the product with a trending sound and showcase product in use.
2. Honest review including unboxing, talking about the products selling points, and how to use it.
In our experience, 90% of our sales have come from videos of us showcasing the product in use, allowing the audience to engage with "TheBaileyBoyz". As our dedicated following enjoys watching the "TheBaileyBoyz" have fun!
I will send the video with my watermark displayed on it' to your email prior to posting for your approval.
Additionally, included in the $500 flat rate is a $50 promotion that I will pay for the video to ensure the video reaches, "at minimum" 10,000 views and optimal sales.
If this is something you're interested in, feel free to reply with details of the product and I will send the invoice.
TheBaileyBoyz DO NOT do any promotions for clothing or jewelry.
Thanks!

subject: Let’s collab! Re: Your YSL Beauty & Fenty PR Boxes Are Waiting For You... 📦🎀
body:
Thank you for reaching out. I'd love to discuss a collaboration with
you. I unfortunately do not have enough time to take on any more
gifted collaborations.

Right now I am willing to work for brands on bundles. My rate is
$2,000 for 5 videos. I have found that posting a product at least 5
times in different ways has a higher chance of exposure and gaining
more traction. I will post all 5 videos to my main account
(@amber.mercier). I also have two backup accounts… one is a midsize

open to exploring opportunities to promote your products on TikTok. In
terms of collaboration fees, I typically charge a $500 flat rate plus
commissions for my services. This flat rate encompasses the creation
of one of the following types of videos:

product's key selling points, and instructions on its use.

redeem the coupon for the specific product.

part to ensure that the video garners views, thereby maximizing
exposure and potential sales.

provide further details about the product. Upon receipt of the

consideration.

subject: Collaboration Request Re: Your YSL Beauty & Fenty PR Boxes Are Waiting For You... 📦🎀
body:
Hi,

Thank you so much for reaching out regarding a collaboration with me!
I'll be happy to consider promoting your brand and adding your
product(s) to my list of future promotions.

I create engaging, high converting videos for brands to drive sales
and product/brand awareness and I enjoy building long lasting and
beneficial partnerships through my collaborations.

I've included my rates and requirements below for your reference.

If you're interested in discussing a collaboration further, please
send an email to the address found at the bottom of this email and we
can go over your needs in more detail.


Rates & Requirements


* I will need a physical sample of any product that you would like me
to review/ promote. This can be sent to me after we agree to the
collaboration.

* My current rates are $75 - $150 per video, depending on the style of
content you prefer

* Package deals for numerous/bulk videos are available

* Ongoing collaborations are available

* For new collaboration agreements, I require that 50% of the agreed
upon fee be paid up front and the remaining 50% be paid at the time
your videos are uploaded/delivered.

* Payments can be submitted via an online invoice or PayPal.

*** Please email me at the following address to discuss our potential
collaboration further.

*** Please use "Collaboration Request" in the subject line

*** Please include links to your TikTok shop, your products and/or
your website in your email. As well as any other relevant information
related to your collaboration needs.


collab.danielle.marie@gmail.com



I look forward to discussing a future collaboration with you!


Thank you,

Danielle Marie

subject: Please READ ME Re: Why 99% of Influencers Don't Hear Back From Brands (& How You Can Avoid This) 💵🎀
body:
Hi doll

Your business is very important to me.

Due to the high volume of inquiries, please allow time for a response.
All emails are answered in the order in which they were received
therefore, multiple emails do result in a longer wait time.

Please note: no emails are answered Friday-Sundays.

Mani Makeup Artist  exclusively provides makeup artistry services.

For all inquiries, please reply with the following information if you
haven’t done so already:

-Full Name
-Occasion (civil, bridal morning, reception, guest of a party, etc)
-Date(s)
- ﻿﻿Time you need to be ready by (per event)
- ﻿﻿Time gap available between events (if booking for multiple events
on the same day)
- ﻿﻿Full location/venue address with postcode where you'll be getting
ready (per event)
This information helps us give you an exact quote.
-Number of ladies requiring makeup artistry services
-Photographers and hairstylists time of arrival

Please note I do not do hair as stated in my bio!

Please note that I am unable to confirm bookings until a 50% booking
fee is received within 48 hours. This is non refundable /
transferable.

Do not opt for Party packages  if you are the bride. I have terminated
bookings in the past for this, so please make sure you book the
correct makeup package otherwise your deposit will be retained after
the termination of your booking.

If any information is missing from your query, your slot will be given
to someone who has provided all of the information required.

For all Blogging, Brand & PR Collaborations
Please allow me 2-3 business days to respond.

Again, thank you for considering Mani Makeup Artist as your makeup
artist of choice.


Love,
Mani
Instagram: @manimakeupartist @mendhimemoriesdecor

body:

Thanks ,
Jasmine
On Sun, May 18, 2025 at 4:45 PM Fiona Frills <fiona@mail.influencerinsider.club> wrote:
Hey!
As promised, The exacttt email template that's helped my community members land PR from brands like Glow recipe, Skims, and many more!
Once I talked to my manager friend and imagined myself as the person reading these emails…
As the creator partnerships manager, logging on every day to see hundreds of nearly identical messages.
“Hi, I’m a micro-influencer, I’d love to work with you…”
over and over again. Everything clicked!!!
No wonder I wasn’t getting noticed… my emails looked like the
thousands
they get every month. 🤦‍♀️
So, I changed my ✨ approach ✨. I made my emails
impossible to ignore
—and everything shifted!!
The Email That Finally Worked for me and my community girlies!
Subject:
A PR Collab That’s Actually Worth Your Time
Hey [Brand Rep’s Name],
I know your inbox is packed with PR requests, so I’ll keep this short.
I create high-value, engaging content beyond the typical unboxing. I’d LOVE to showcase [specific product] in a way that highlights its [key feature or benefit], making it feel truly relatable & exciting for my audience!
In exchange for PR, I’d love to provide one of the following:
1 TikTok Post + Tag
1 IG Reel Post + Tag
1 UGC Video with usage rights
3 High-Quality Product Photos
A bit about me:
[PICTURE OF INFO]
I’m all about creative collaborations that actually convert PR into
visibility + engagement.
Would love to make this happen ASAP—let me know what you think!?
[Social media links]
Thanks so much,
[Your Name]
Why This Email Works (And Why Mine Didn’t Before)
Instead of blending into the inbox chaos, this email:
✨
Acknowledges the brand’s perspective
—they’re busy, so I keep it quick.
✨
Feels personal & real
—not robotic or overly formal.
✨
Makes it easy to say yes
—bullet points make the offer clear & compelling.
✨
Positions me as a valuable content partner
—not just someone asking for free stuff.
✨
Creative image—
makes you stand out RIGHT away.
The first time a brand replied with,
“This is exactly the kind of partnership we’re looking for. Let’s do it!”
I literally screamedddd. I’d finally cracked the code!!
And I want you to experience that too 🫶
So, before you send your next brand outreach email, ask yourself:
Does this stand out? Would I reply to this if I were the brand?
If not,
rewrite it.
Make it
bold
. Make it
different
. Make it
irresistible
!!!
This is how you
stop looking like everyone else
—and start getting on PR lists, building real relationships, and turning gifting into paid deals!
You. got. this!!!
Much love,
Fiona
P.S. Try sending this template on Tuesday or Thursday  mornings between 9am-3pm for the highest response rates!!

body:

On 21 May 2025, at 19:34, Fiona Frills <fiona@mail.influencerinsider.club> wrote:
﻿
hiii!!
as the owner of Frilliance, i see TONS of PR requests at hey@frilliance.com every month… (legitimately thousands)
…and guess what? i rarely see those emails myself! 🤭
why? because, like most brands, our main emails (hey@, hello@, support@) are handled by customer service teams who deal with:
order problems
refunds
shipping questions
product help
they don’t decide who gets PR! those emails either get deleted or just sit there… 🫠
even emailing
PR@rhode
is bad… that inbox is flooded with thousands of requests…
and they end up saying no to 99% of those emails!
this is why most micro-influencers never hear back from brands!!
✨ The Truth: You Need to Email the REAL People Who Handle PR ✨
influencer marketing managers
social media managers
PR teams
hardly anyone is doing this, and finding the right contact will put you MILES ahead of every other micro-influencer
plus it’ll save you a ton of time!!! the right email will start with their
name
NOT PR!!
the hard part is finding these people… their emails are not just on the brands website, you have to do some digging…
this is exactly what i show you in Influencer Insider… 🤭
inside, you’ll learn:
exactly HOW to find the right person at any brand (& their email)
the tools i use to get past those general inboxes
email templates that actually work!
i’m sharing secrets from both sides—as a brand owner AND a creator with 1M+ followers :)

“Hi, I’m a micro-influencer, I’d love to work with you…”
over and over again. Everything clicked!!!
No wonder I wasn’t getting noticed… my emails looked like the
thousands
they get every month. 🤦‍♀️
So, I changed my ✨ approach ✨. I made my emails
impossible to ignore
—and everything shifted!!
The Email That Finally Worked for me and my community girlies!
Subject:
A PR Collab That’s Actually Worth Your Time
Hey [Brand Rep’s Name],
I know your inbox is packed with PR requests, so I’ll keep this short.
I create high-value, engaging content beyond the typical unboxing. I’d LOVE to showcase [specific product] in a way that highlights its [key feature or benefit], making it feel truly relatable & exciting for my audience!
In exchange for PR, I’d love to provide one of the following:
1 TikTok Post + Tag
1 IG Reel Post + Tag
1 UGC Video with usage rights
3 High-Quality Product Photos
A bit about me:
[PICTURE OF INFO]
I’m all about creative collaborations that actually convert PR into
visibility + engagement.
Would love to make this happen ASAP—let me know what you think!?
[Social media links]
Thanks so much,
[Your Name]
Why This Email Works (And Why Mine Didn’t Before)
Instead of blending into the inbox chaos, this email:
✨
Acknowledges the brand’s perspective
—they’re busy, so I keep it quick.
✨
Feels personal & real
—not robotic or overly formal.
✨
Makes it easy to say yes
—bullet points make the offer clear & compelling.
✨
Positions me as a valuable content partner
—not just someone asking for free stuff.
✨
Creative image—
makes you stand out RIGHT away.
The first time a brand replied with,
“This is exactly the kind of partnership we’re looking for. Let’s do it!”
I literally screamedddd. I’d finally cracked the code!!
And I want you to experience that too 🫶
So, before you send your next brand outreach email, ask yourself:
Does this stand out? Would I reply to this if I were the brand?
If not,
rewrite it.
Make it
bold
. Make it
different
. Make it
irresistible
!!!
This is how you
stop looking like everyone else
—and start getting on PR lists, building real relationships, and turning gifting into paid deals!
You. got. this!!!
Much love,
Fiona
P.S. Try sending this template on Tuesday or Thursday  mornings between 9am-3pm for the highest response rates!!

subject: Re: The exact reason why some micro influencers get PR (and others don't) 👀🎀📦
body:
Thank you so much, this is helpful!
On Tue, May 13, 2025 at 4:22 AM Fiona Frills <fiona@hi.influencerinsider.club> wrote:
Heyyy!
As someone who has sent out
thousands
of PR boxes from my brand Frilliance, I wanted to share something that completelyyy changed my perspective as both a brand owner AND an influencer.
There's a clear difference between creators who get PR consistently/paid brand deals and those who don't—and it's not about follower count (crazy i know lol). 👀
Here are the 5 things successful micro influencers (500 to 5,000) DO that get them on tons of PR lists:
DO:
1. Research the right contact person - Never send to generic "info@" emails (they're literally black holes for PR requests a NO NO)
2. Customize each email outreach - Brands can smell a copy-pasted template from miles away🧍‍♀️(it shows brands your not that interested in them)
3. Show specific value - Explain exactly how your content style matches their brand (with screenshot examples to stand out!)
4. Follow up strategically - The magic often happens in the follow-up (I'll share my exact timeline below)
5. Stand out visually - Use design elements (or photos) in your email! That make you instantly memorable!! ✨
And here are the 5 things that get your emails deleted immediately:
DON'T:
1. Focus on follower count - Starting with "I have X followers" screams amateur ah!
2. Write paragraphs about yourself - Brands care about what you can do for THEM 👀
3. Use generic compliments - "I love your brand!" means nothing without specifics details.
4. Send the same message to competitors - Brands talk to each other more than you think…
5. Give up after one attempt - most successful PR partnerships happen after the 2nd or 3rd contact! :)
If you missed my last email with the list of 20 brands actively seeking micro influencers right now,
click here.
Being an influencer (making money & getting PR) is tough, which is why I'm sharing these insider secrets most established creators won't tell you. I've been on both sides of this, and I want to be the guide I wish I had!! Because OH MY… it can be overwhelming.
ALSO Here’s the most successful follow-up schedule I've seen is: first email → wait 5 days → follow-up #1 → wait 7 days → follow-up #2. This simple rhythm has tripled PR acceptance rates for my community members!!
Much love,
Fiona
P.S. In the email i’m going to get raw and real with you and share a story that I think you’ll love 🫶

body:
$3,‌000 USD up for grabs! Three winners will get $1,‌000 each.‌
‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌
Hi Friend,
Postmark is teaming up with DEV.to to host our first-ever developer challenge: Inbox Innovators, and we're inviting you to participate! Starting May 21st, we're challenging you to create something awesome using Postmark's Inbound Email Processing.
Learn more
What's the challenge about?
It's delightfully straightforward: build something cool that uses Postmark's Inbound Email Processing. That's it!
Maybe you'll create an email-powered CMS where content managers can publish by simply sending an email. Or perhaps an AI assistant that users interact with entirely through their inbox. The only limit is your imagination (and the June 1st deadline).
The important details:
📅 Challenge kicks off: May 21st, 2025
📨 Submissions due: June 1st, 2025 (23:59 PT)
🏆 Winners announced: June 12th, 2025
💰 Prizes: $3,000 up for grabs! The top three entries will get $1,000 USD
Why participate?
Besides the obvious (prizes! bragging rights!), this is your chance to explore one of Postmark's most powerful but sometimes overlooked features. Inbound Processing transforms your application from a one-way messenger to a two-way conversation hub.
Check out our
full announcement post
for inspiration, resources, and all the technical details to get started.
Ready to build something awesome? We can't wait to see what you come up with!
Happy coding,
The Postmark Team

Hey!
As promised, The exacttt email template that's helped my community members land PR from brands like Glow recipe, Skims, and many more!
Once I talked to my manager friend and imagined myself as the person reading these emails…
As the creator partnerships manager, logging on every day to see hundreds of nearly identical messages.
“Hi, I’m a micro-influencer, I’d love to work with you…”
over and over again. Everything clicked!!!
No wonder I wasn’t getting noticed… my emails looked like the
thousands
they get every month. 🤦‍♀️
So, I changed my ✨ approach ✨. I made my emails
impossible to ignore
—and everything shifted!!
The Email That Finally Worked for me and my community girlies!
Subject:
A PR Collab That’s Actually Worth Your Time
Hey [Brand Rep’s Name],
I know your inbox is packed with PR requests, so I’ll keep this short.
I create high-value, engaging content beyond the typical unboxing. I’d LOVE to showcase [specific product] in a way that highlights its [key feature or benefit], making it feel truly relatable & exciting for my audience!
In exchange for PR, I’d love to provide one of the following:
1 TikTok Post + Tag
1 IG Reel Post + Tag
1 UGC Video with usage rights
3 High-Quality Product Photos
A bit about me:
[PICTURE OF INFO]
I’m all about creative collaborations that actually convert PR into
visibility + engagement.
Would love to make this happen ASAP—let me know what you think!?
[Social media links]
Thanks so much,
[Your Name]
Why This Email Works (And Why Mine Didn’t Before)
Instead of blending into the inbox chaos, this email:
✨
Acknowledges the brand’s perspective
—they’re busy, so I keep it quick.
✨
Feels personal & real
—not robotic or overly formal.
✨
Makes it easy to say yes
—bullet points make the offer clear & compelling.
✨
Positions me as a valuable content partner
—not just someone asking for free stuff.
✨
Creative image—
makes you stand out RIGHT away.
The first time a brand replied with,
“This is exactly the kind of partnership we’re looking for. Let’s do it!”
I literally screamedddd. I’d finally cracked the code!!
And I want you to experience that too 🫶
So, before you send your next brand outreach email, ask yourself:
Does this stand out? Would I reply to this if I were the brand?
If not,
rewrite it.
Make it
bold
. Make it
different
. Make it
irresistible
!!!
This is how you
stop looking like everyone else
—and start getting on PR lists, building real relationships, and turning gifting into paid deals!
You. got. this!!!
Much love,
Fiona
P.S. Try sending this template on Tuesday or Thursday  mornings between 9am-3pm for the highest response rates!!

open to exploring opportunities to promote your products on TikTok. In
terms of collaboration fees, I typically charge a $500 flat rate plus
commissions for my services. This flat rate encompasses the creation
of one of the following types of videos:

2. An honest review featuring an unboxing, an overview of the
product's key selling points, and instructions on its use.
3. Promotion of a sale or coupon, including information on how to

part to ensure that the video garners views, thereby maximizing
exposure and potential sales.

necessary information, I will promptly generate an invoice for your
consideration.

subject: Collaboration Request Re: I put together something for you (300+ brands + my PR system) 📦✨
body:
Hi,

Thank you so much for reaching out regarding a collaboration with me!
I'll be happy to consider promoting your brand and adding your
product(s) to my list of future promotions.

I create engaging, high converting videos for brands to drive sales
and product/brand awareness and I enjoy building long lasting and
beneficial partnerships through my collaborations.

I've included my rates and requirements below for your reference.

If you're interested in discussing a collaboration further, please
send an email to the address found at the bottom of this email and we
can go over your needs in more detail.


Rates & Requirements


* I will need a physical sample of any product that you would like me
to review/ promote. This can be sent to me after we agree to the
collaboration.

* My current rates are $75 - $150 per video, depending on the style of
content you prefer

* Package deals for numerous/bulk videos are available

* Ongoing collaborations are available

* For new collaboration agreements, I require that 50% of the agreed
upon fee be paid up front and the remaining 50% be paid at the time
your videos are uploaded/delivered.

* Payments can be submitted via an online invoice or PayPal.

*** Please email me at the following address to discuss our potential
collaboration further.

*** Please use "Collaboration Request" in the subject line

*** Please include links to your TikTok shop, your products and/or
your website in your email. As well as any other relevant information
related to your collaboration needs.


collab.danielle.marie@gmail.com



I look forward to discussing a future collaboration with you!


Thank you,

Danielle Marie

subject: Re: The exact email template that lands PR packages & Brand partnerships 📦✨
body:
Thank you for sending me this template! I will be using this!
Best regards,
Vannib
On May 17, 2025, at 1:05 PM, Fiona Frills <fiona@mail.influencerinsider.club> wrote:
﻿
Hey!
As promised, The exacttt email template that's helped my community members land PR from brands like Glow recipe, Skims, and many more!
Once I talked to my manager friend and imagined myself as the person reading these emails…
As the creator partnerships manager, logging on every day to see hundreds of nearly identical messages.
“Hi, I’m a micro-influencer, I’d love to work with you…”
over and over again. Everything clicked!!!
No wonder I wasn’t getting noticed… my emails looked like the
thousands
they get every month. 🤦‍♀️
So, I changed my ✨ approach ✨. I made my emails
impossible to ignore
—and everything shifted!!
The Email That Finally Worked for me and my community girlies!
Subject:
A PR Collab That’s Actually Worth Your Time
Hey [Brand Rep’s Name],
I know your inbox is packed with PR requests, so I’ll keep this short.
I create high-value, engaging content beyond the typical unboxing. I’d LOVE to showcase [specific product] in a way that highlights its [key feature or benefit], making it feel truly relatable & exciting for my audience!
In exchange for PR, I’d love to provide one of the following:
1 TikTok Post + Tag
1 IG Reel Post + Tag
1 UGC Video with usage rights
3 High-Quality Product Photos
A bit about me:
[PICTURE OF INFO]
I’m all about creative collaborations that actually convert PR into
visibility + engagement.
Would love to make this happen ASAP—let me know what you think!?
[Social media links]
Thanks so much,
[Your Name]
Why This Email Works (And Why Mine Didn’t Before)
Instead of blending into the inbox chaos, this email:
✨
Acknowledges the brand’s perspective
—they’re busy, so I keep it quick.
✨
Feels personal & real
—not robotic or overly formal.
✨
Makes it easy to say yes
—bullet points make the offer clear & compelling.
✨
Positions me as a valuable content partner
—not just someone asking for free stuff.
✨
Creative image—
makes you stand out RIGHT away.
The first time a brand replied with,
“This is exactly the kind of partnership we’re looking for. Let’s do it!”
I literally screamedddd. I’d finally cracked the code!!
And I want you to experience that too 🫶
So, before you send your next brand outreach email, ask yourself:
Does this stand out? Would I reply to this if I were the brand?
If not,
rewrite it.
Make it
bold
. Make it
different
. Make it
irresistible
!!!
This is how you
stop looking like everyone else
—and start getting on PR lists, building real relationships, and turning gifting into paid deals!
You. got. this!!!
Much love,
Fiona
P.S. Try sending this template on Tuesday or Thursday  mornings between 9am-3pm for the highest response rates!!

influencer marketing managers

subject: Please READ ME Re: So proud! Another member just got her first PR package 📦✨
body:
Hi doll

Your business is very important to me.

Due to the high volume of inquiries, please allow time for a response.
All emails are answered in the order in which they were received
therefore, multiple emails do result in a longer wait time.

Please note: no emails are answered Friday-Sundays.

Mani Makeup Artist  exclusively provides makeup artistry services.

For all inquiries, please reply with the following information if you
haven’t done so already:

-Full Name
-Occasion (civil, bridal morning, reception, guest of a party, etc)
-Date(s)
- ﻿﻿Time you need to be ready by (per event)
- ﻿﻿Time gap available between events (if booking for multiple events
on the same day)
- ﻿﻿Full location/venue address with postcode where you'll be getting
ready (per event)
This information helps us give you an exact quote.
-Number of ladies requiring makeup artistry services
-Photographers and hairstylists time of arrival

Please note I do not do hair as stated in my bio!

Please note that I am unable to confirm bookings until a 50% booking
fee is received within 48 hours. This is non refundable /
transferable.

Do not opt for Party packages  if you are the bride. I have terminated
bookings in the past for this, so please make sure you book the
correct makeup package otherwise your deposit will be retained after
the termination of your booking.

If any information is missing from your query, your slot will be given
to someone who has provided all of the information required.

For all Blogging, Brand & PR Collaborations
Please allow me 2-3 business days to respond.

Again, thank you for considering Mani Makeup Artist as your makeup
artist of choice.


Love,
Mani
Instagram: @manimakeupartist @mendhimemoriesdecor

Thank you for reaching out. We would love to collaborate with you. We charge a $500 flat rate plus commissions for collaborations. This $500 flat rate will include your choice of one of these two types of videos.
1. Detail shots of the product with a trending sound and showcase product in use.
2. Honest review including unboxing, talking about the products selling points, and how to use it.
In our experience, 90% of our sales have come from videos of us showcasing the product in use, allowing the audience to engage with "TheBaileyBoyz". As our dedicated following enjoys watching the "TheBaileyBoyz" have fun!
I will send the video with my watermark displayed on it' to your email prior to posting for your approval.
Additionally, included in the $500 flat rate is a $50 promotion that I will pay for the video to ensure the video reaches, "at minimum" 10,000 views and optimal sales.
If this is something you're interested in, feel free to reply with details of the product and I will send the invoice.
TheBaileyBoyz DO NOT do any promotions for clothing or jewelry.
Thanks!

subject: Re: From Rejected to Going on Brand Trips (storytime) 🙈
body:
Thank you for this❤️🤭!
On Mon, 12 May 2025 at 22:47, Fiona Frills <fiona@team.influencerinsider.club> wrote:
Hey!
The real reality of being an Influencer, I'm about to get vulnerable with you <3
Before my beauty brand was in CVS and Walmart, before the 1M+ YouTube subscribers...
I was exactly where you might be right now. Right before everything turns around!!
Back in 2013, I spent 3 months creating the
perfect
beauty content.
My lighting was great, my edits were clean, and I was posting consistently.
My follower count was slowly growing, but brands weren't noticing me…
Only the weirdest companies (vacuum companies & gaming apps lolll)
So I did what I thought would work… I sent 47 DMs to beauty brands I loved, each one carefully crafted with compliments about their products.
I was SO excited about the potential PR packages and brand deals headed my way!!
The response??!
Absolutely nothing. Well actually 2 polite rejections.🧍‍♀️
I was sooo confused. I watched other creators with FEWER followers than me unboxing beautiful PR boxes.
What were they doing that I wasn't??!
The turning point came when I accidentally made friends with a PR manager at a event in LA.
After a few phone calls, she confessed something that changed everythinggg for me!!
Later that day, she showed me the email templates her and her team use and ways to find brand contacts!!
SUCH A QUEEN.
And what I saw shocked me—the successful pitches/emails looked NOTHING like what I'd been sending….
I starting using her tips that week:
I found the right email contacts instead of DMing (NOT
Pr@brand.com
either)
I created a visual email that stood out (more tips coming)
I structured my pitch around the brand's needs, not mine
I followed up consistently using her recommended schedule (this worked wonders!!!)
Within 30 days, I received my first PR package from a major brand and had brands wanting to PAY ME!!!
Which was a huge step for me!!
3 months later, my doorstep was flooded with packages, including brands I'd previously been ignored by. 🤭
A year later going on brand trips!!!! (First one was with Emma chamberlain & so many incredible influencers)
The crazy part? The ONLY thing that changed was how I approached brands!!
I'm sharing this because I don't want you to waste months like I did.
In tomorrow's email, I'm sending you a free template that's helped girls in my community land their first PR partnerships!! :)
Your perfectly packaged PR & brand relationships that PAYYY is closer than you think!
Much love,
Fiona
P.S. 2 of my close friends are influencer managers and  90% of influencers approach brands completely wrong. Let's make sure you're in the other 10%!! 🫶

why? because the price of larger creators is getting SO high ($100,000+ per video), and even the biggest brands can’t justify that price tag. it’s way cheaper for them to send 100+ PR boxes to smaller influencers (only $20 each) & actually reach a bigger audience!!

sooo i pulled together a list of 20 of the biggest brands looking for micro to mid-size influencers right now—including:

subject: Re: From Rejected to Going on Brand Trips (storytime) 🙈
body:
Hi! Can I get info!
On Fri, May 16, 2025 at 4:02 PM Fiona Frills <fiona@team.influencerinsider.club> wrote:
Hey!
The real reality of being an Influencer, I'm about to get vulnerable with you <3
Before my beauty brand was in CVS and Walmart, before the 1M+ YouTube subscribers...
I was exactly where you might be right now. Right before everything turns around!!
Back in 2013, I spent 3 months creating the
perfect
beauty content.
My lighting was great, my edits were clean, and I was posting consistently.
My follower count was slowly growing, but brands weren't noticing me…
Only the weirdest companies (vacuum companies & gaming apps lolll)
So I did what I thought would work… I sent 47 DMs to beauty brands I loved, each one carefully crafted with compliments about their products.
I was SO excited about the potential PR packages and brand deals headed my way!!
The response??!
Absolutely nothing. Well actually 2 polite rejections.🧍‍♀️
I was sooo confused. I watched other creators with FEWER followers than me unboxing beautiful PR boxes.
What were they doing that I wasn't??!
The turning point came when I accidentally made friends with a PR manager at a event in LA.
After a few phone calls, she confessed something that changed everythinggg for me!!
Later that day, she showed me the email templates her and her team use and ways to find brand contacts!!
SUCH A QUEEN.
And what I saw shocked me—the successful pitches/emails looked NOTHING like what I'd been sending….
I starting using her tips that week:
I found the right email contacts instead of DMing (NOT
Pr@brand.com
either)
I created a visual email that stood out (more tips coming)
I structured my pitch around the brand's needs, not mine
I followed up consistently using her recommended schedule (this worked wonders!!!)
Within 30 days, I received my first PR package from a major brand and had brands wanting to PAY ME!!!
Which was a huge step for me!!
3 months later, my doorstep was flooded with packages, including brands I'd previously been ignored by. 🤭
A year later going on brand trips!!!! (First one was with Emma chamberlain & so many incredible influencers)
The crazy part? The ONLY thing that changed was how I approached brands!!
I'm sharing this because I don't want you to waste months like I did.
In tomorrow's email, I'm sending you a free template that's helped girls in my community land their first PR partnerships!! :)
Your perfectly packaged PR & brand relationships that PAYYY is closer than you think!
Much love,
Fiona
P.S. 2 of my close friends are influencer managers and  90% of influencers approach brands completely wrong. Let's make sure you're in the other 10%!! 🫶

subject: Let’s collab! Re: Yes, this is Fiona. Yes, this is real. And it’s just the beginning!! 👀
body:
Thank you for reaching out. I'd love to discuss a collaboration with
you. I unfortunately do not have enough time to take on any more
gifted collaborations.

Right now I am willing to work for brands on bundles. My rate is
$2,000 for 5 videos. I have found that posting a product at least 5
times in different ways has a higher chance of exposure and gaining
more traction. I will post all 5 videos to my main account
(@amber.mercier). I also have two backup accounts… one is a midsize
fashion niche (@midsizemom) and the other is mom content mostly toys
(@merciermom) if you’d be more interested in me posting on those.

As a bonus I will post those videos to my Amazon influencer account. I
will also provide the ad codes with an agreement that my commission
rate won’t change.

If you’re looking for UGC work I’d love to discuss the deliverables and my rates

I’m looking forward to hopefully starting a lasting partnership.

-Amber Mercier .

--
Media Kit
@meetthemerciers

subject: Collaboration Opportunity Inquiry Re: Yes, this is Fiona. Yes, this is real. And it’s just the beginning!! 👀
body:
Thank you for reaching out to discuss a potential collaboration. I am
open to exploring opportunities to promote your products on TikTok. In
terms of collaboration fees, I typically charge a $500 flat rate plus
commissions for my services. This flat rate encompasses the creation
of one of the following types of videos:

1. Detailed shots of the product accompanied by a trending sound.
2. An honest review featuring an unboxing, an overview of the
product's key selling points, and instructions on its use.
3. Promotion of a sale or coupon, including information on how to
redeem the coupon for the specific product.

Moreover, the $500 fee includes a $50 promotional investment on my
part to ensure that the video garners views, thereby maximizing
exposure and potential sales.

If this proposal aligns with your objectives, please feel free to
provide further details about the product. Upon receipt of the
necessary information, I will promptly generate an invoice for your
consideration.

I look forward to the possibility of working together.

Hey!
As promised, The exacttt email template that's helped my community members land PR from brands like Glow recipe, Skims, and many more!
Once I talked to my manager friend and imagined myself as the person reading these emails…
As the creator partnerships manager, logging on every day to see hundreds of nearly identical messages.
“Hi, I’m a micro-influencer, I’d love to work with you…”
over and over again. Everything clicked!!!
No wonder I wasn’t getting noticed… my emails looked like the
thousands
they get every month. 🤦‍♀️
So, I changed my ✨ approach ✨. I made my emails
impossible to ignore
—and everything shifted!!
The Email That Finally Worked for me and my community girlies!
Subject:
A PR Collab That’s Actually Worth Your Time
Hey [Brand Rep’s Name],
I know your inbox is packed with PR requests, so I’ll keep this short.
I create high-value, engaging content beyond the typical unboxing. I’d LOVE to showcase [specific product] in a way that highlights its [key feature or benefit], making it feel truly relatable & exciting for my audience!
In exchange for PR, I’d love to provide one of the following:
1 TikTok Post + Tag
1 IG Reel Post + Tag
1 UGC Video with usage rights
3 High-Quality Product Photos
A bit about me:
[PICTURE OF INFO]
I’m all about creative collaborations that actually convert PR into
visibility + engagement.
Would love to make this happen ASAP—let me know what you think!?
[Social media links]
Thanks so much,
[Your Name]
Why This Email Works (And Why Mine Didn’t Before)
Instead of blending into the inbox chaos, this email:
✨
Acknowledges the brand’s perspective
—they’re busy, so I keep it quick.
✨
Feels personal & real
—not robotic or overly formal.
✨
Makes it easy to say yes
—bullet points make the offer clear & compelling.
✨
Positions me as a valuable content partner
—not just someone asking for free stuff.
✨
Creative image—
makes you stand out RIGHT away.
The first time a brand replied with,
“This is exactly the kind of partnership we’re looking for. Let’s do it!”
I literally screamedddd. I’d finally cracked the code!!
And I want you to experience that too 🫶
So, before you send your next brand outreach email, ask yourself:
Does this stand out? Would I reply to this if I were the brand?
If not,
rewrite it.
Make it
bold
. Make it
different
. Make it
irresistible
!!!
This is how you
stop looking like everyone else
—and start getting on PR lists, building real relationships, and turning gifting into paid deals!
You. got. this!!!
Much love,
Fiona
P.S. Try sending this template on Tuesday or Thursday  mornings between 9am-3pm for the highest response rates!!

body:
Hi,

Thank you so much for reaching out regarding a collaboration with me!
I'll be happy to consider promoting your brand and adding your
product(s) to my list of future promotions.

I create engaging, high converting videos for brands to drive sales
and product/brand awareness and I enjoy building long lasting and
beneficial partnerships through my collaborations.

I've included my rates and requirements below for your reference.

If you're interested in discussing a collaboration further, please
send an email to the address found at the bottom of this email and we
can go over your needs in more detail.


Rates & Requirements


* I will need a physical sample of any product that you would like me
to review/ promote. This can be sent to me after we agree to the
collaboration.

* My current rates are $75 - $150 per video, depending on the style of
content you prefer

* Package deals for numerous/bulk videos are available

* Ongoing collaborations are available

* For new collaboration agreements, I require that 50% of the agreed
upon fee be paid up front and the remaining 50% be paid at the time
your videos are uploaded/delivered.

* Payments can be submitted via an online invoice or PayPal.

*** Please email me at the following address to discuss our potential
collaboration further.

*** Please use "Collaboration Request" in the subject line

*** Please include links to your TikTok shop, your products and/or
your website in your email. As well as any other relevant information
related to your collaboration needs.


collab.danielle.marie@gmail.com



I look forward to discussing a future collaboration with you!


Thank you,

Danielle Marie

Hey!
Since sharing Influencer Insider yesterday, my inbox has been flooded with questions about whether this really going to work for you…
Well rather than telling you what's possible, I'll let the influencer insider girls speak for themselves!! :)
The other day I got the sweetesttt update from one of our OG Influencer Insider girlies and I literally screamed!!
(Umm Fenty, YSL, Wet N Wild… all in one haul?! Stackeddd!!)
Just a few months ago, she was in a totally different spot…
She was putting in effort, creating cute content, reaching out to brands but… barely getting any replies.
She felt so overwhelmed and frustrated, because she was seeing girls with similar content, get brand deals and PR responses.
Then she got our email inviting her to test the Influencer Insider system — and she said, “Why not? What’s the worst that can happen?!”
Fast forward to now… 🤭
She’s getting 3–5 PR packages a WEEK. YAY!
She’s already made over $1,250 in paid brand deals. AMAZING!!
And she has just 6.2k followers!!
Like… are you kidding?! That’s what happens when you believe in yourself and use the right strategy!
Inside Influencer Insider, I break down exactly what she did:
How to find the right brand contacts
Create emails they can’t ignore
Turn PR into paid opportunities
Create content that gets noticed (and reposted!)
I’m not promising overnight success. She showed up, stayed consistent, and followed every step. But she’s proof that it works!!
And guess what? I
know
you can do it too!!
Join Influencer Insider today for a one time payment of $28.00 (not a subscription)— it’s worth WAY more, think of all the success you can absolutely have!
Because this is about
supporting you
— not gatekeeping the industry secrets!! too many gatekeepers in this world!
Click Here To Join Influencer Insider
And I’m ALSO including my personal contact list of 300+ brand emails. Let’s get you on those PR lists & build brand relationships!
Dreams become reality all the time… they did for me, they did for her, and they can for YOU too. 🫶
You got this!!

Fiona

Hi influencer,
Historically, Domain Search in Hunter provided 10 emails per Search Credit, but you had minimal visibility into the department or role associated with the contacts. This was great for bulk outreach, but
as we've learned
, it's not nearly as effective as targeted outreach.
That’s why we’ve just launched a new way to find leads inside Hunter that puts decision makers front and center, enabling more control over who you target.
Here’s what’s new:
See verified decision makers first, grouped by department and ranked by relevance
Filter by job title and department to target exactly who you need
Reveal email addresses only when you’re ready to contact them
Start your next search

subject: Re: The exact reason why some micro influencers get PR (and others don't) 👀🎀📦
body:
Hi I'm interested
On Fri, May 9, 2025, 2:16 AM Fiona <fiona@hi.influencerinsider.club> wrote:
Heyyy!
As someone who has sent out
thousands
of PR boxes from my brand Frilliance, I wanted to share something that completelyyy changed my perspective as both a brand owner AND an influencer.
There's a clear difference between creators who get PR consistently/paid brand deals and those who don't—and it's not about follower count (crazy i know lol). 👀
Here are the 5 things successful micro influencers (500 to 5,000) DO that get them on tons of PR lists:
DO:
1. Research the right contact person - Never send to generic "info@" emails (they're literally black holes for PR requests a NO NO)
2. Customize each email outreach - Brands can smell a copy-pasted template from miles away🧍‍♀️(it shows brands your not that interested in them)
3. Show specific value - Explain exactly how your content style matches their brand (with screenshot examples to stand out!)
4. Follow up strategically - The magic often happens in the follow-up (I'll share my exact timeline below)
5. Stand out visually - Use design elements (or photos) in your email! That make you instantly memorable!! ✨
And here are the 5 things that get your emails deleted immediately:
DON'T:
1. Focus on follower count - Starting with "I have X followers" screams amateur ah!
2. Write paragraphs about yourself - Brands care about what you can do for THEM 👀
3. Use generic compliments - "I love your brand!" means nothing without specifics details.
4. Send the same message to competitors - Brands talk to each other more than you think…
5. Give up after one attempt - most successful PR partnerships happen after the 2nd or 3rd contact! :)
If you missed my last email with the list of 20 brands actively seeking micro influencers right now,
click here.
Being an influencer (making money & getting PR) is tough, which is why I'm sharing these insider secrets most established creators won't tell you. I've been on both sides of this, and I want to be the guide I wish I had!! Because OH MY… it can be overwhelming.
ALSO Here’s the most successful follow-up schedule I've seen is: first email → wait 5 days → follow-up #1 → wait 7 days → follow-up #2. This simple rhythm has tripled PR acceptance rates for my community members!!

On Sun, May 11, 2025, 6:08 AM Fiona Frills <fiona@hi.influencerinsider.club> wrote:
Hey!
The real reality of being an Influencer, I'm about to get vulnerable with you <3
Before my beauty brand was in CVS and Walmart, before the 1M+ YouTube subscribers...
I was exactly where you might be right now. Right before everything turns around!!
Back in 2013, I spent 3 months creating the
perfect
beauty content.
My lighting was great, my edits were clean, and I was posting consistently.
My follower count was slowly growing, but brands weren't noticing me…
Only the weirdest companies (vacuum companies & gaming apps lolll)
So I did what I thought would work… I sent 47 DMs to beauty brands I loved, each one carefully crafted with compliments about their products.
I was SO excited about the potential PR packages and brand deals headed my way!!
The response??!
Absolutely nothing. Well actually 2 polite rejections.🧍‍♀️
I was sooo confused. I watched other creators with FEWER followers than me unboxing beautiful PR boxes.
What were they doing that I wasn't??!
The turning point came when I accidentally made friends with a PR manager at a event in LA.
After a few phone calls, she confessed something that changed everythinggg for me!!
Later that day, she showed me the email templates her and her team use and ways to find brand contacts!!
SUCH A QUEEN.
And what I saw shocked me—the successful pitches/emails looked NOTHING like what I'd been sending….
I starting using her tips that week:
I found the right email contacts instead of DMing (NOT
Pr@brand.com
either)
I created a visual email that stood out (more tips coming)
I structured my pitch around the brand's needs, not mine
I followed up consistently using her recommended schedule (this worked wonders!!!)
Within 30 days, I received my first PR package from a major brand and had brands wanting to PAY ME!!!
Which was a huge step for me!!
3 months later, my doorstep was flooded with packages, including brands I'd previously been ignored by. 🤭
A year later going on brand trips!!!! (First one was with Emma chamberlain & so many incredible influencers)
The crazy part? The ONLY thing that changed was how I approached brands!!
I'm sharing this because I don't want you to waste months like I did.
In tomorrow's email, I'm sending you a free template that's helped girls in my community land their first PR partnerships!! :)
Your perfectly packaged PR & brand relationships that PAYYY is closer than you think!

Fiona

Re: The exact email template that lands PR packages & Brand partnerships 📦✨
body:
Bless you
On Tue, 13 May 2025, 01:03 Fiona Frills, <fiona@mail.influencerinsider.club> wrote:
Hey!
As promised, The exacttt email template that's helped my community members land PR from brands like Glow recipe, Skims, and many more!
Once I talked to my manager friend and imagined myself as the person reading these emails…
As the creator partnerships manager, logging on every day to see hundreds of nearly identical messages.
“Hi, I’m a micro-influencer, I’d love to work with you…”
over and over again. Everything clicked!!!
No wonder I wasn’t getting noticed… my emails looked like the
thousands
they get every month. 🤦‍♀️
So, I changed my ✨ approach ✨. I made my emails
impossible to ignore
—and everything shifted!!
The Email That Finally Worked for me and my community girlies!
Subject:
A PR Collab That’s Actually Worth Your Time
Hey [Brand Rep’s Name],
I know your inbox is packed with PR requests, so I’ll keep this short.
I create high-value, engaging content beyond the typical unboxing. I’d LOVE to showcase [specific product] in a way that highlights its [key feature or benefit], making it feel truly relatable & exciting for my audience!
In exchange for PR, I’d love to provide one of the following:
1 TikTok Post + Tag
1 IG Reel Post + Tag
1 UGC Video with usage rights
3 High-Quality Product Photos
A bit about me:
[PICTURE OF INFO]
I’m all about creative collaborations that actually convert PR into
visibility + engagement.
Would love to make this happen ASAP—let me know what you think!?
[Social media links]
Thanks so much,
[Your Name]
Why This Email Works (And Why Mine Didn’t Before)
Instead of blending into the inbox chaos, this email:
✨
Acknowledges the brand’s perspective
—they’re busy, so I keep it quick.
✨
Feels personal & real
—not robotic or overly formal.
✨
Makes it easy to say yes
—bullet points make the offer clear & compelling.
✨
Positions me as a valuable content partner
—not just someone asking for free stuff.
✨
Creative image—
makes you stand out RIGHT away.
The first time a brand replied with,
“This is exactly the kind of partnership we’re looking for. Let’s do it!”
I literally screamedddd. I’d finally cracked the code!!
And I want you to experience that too 🫶
So, before you send your next brand outreach email, ask yourself:
Does this stand out? Would I reply to this if I were the brand?
If not,
rewrite it.
Make it
bold
. Make it
different
. Make it
irresistible
!!!
This is how you
stop looking like everyone else
—and start getting on PR lists, building real relationships, and turning gifting into paid deals!
You. got. this!!!
Much love,
Fiona
P.S. Try sending this template on Tuesday or Thursday  mornings between 9am-3pm for the highest response rates!!

On Fri, 16 May 2025 at 3:59 am, Fiona Frills <fiona@mail.influencerinsider.club> wrote:
Hey!
As promised, The exacttt email template that's helped my community members land PR from brands like Glow recipe, Skims, and many more!
Once I talked to my manager friend and imagined myself as the person reading these emails…
As the creator partnerships manager, logging on every day to see hundreds of nearly identical messages.
“Hi, I’m a micro-influencer, I’d love to work with you…”
over and over again. Everything clicked!!!
No wonder I wasn’t getting noticed… my emails looked like the
thousands
they get every month. 🤦‍♀️
So, I changed my ✨ approach ✨. I made my emails
impossible to ignore
—and everything shifted!!
The Email That Finally Worked for me and my community girlies!
Subject:
A PR Collab That’s Actually Worth Your Time
Hey [Brand Rep’s Name],
I know your inbox is packed with PR requests, so I’ll keep this short.
I create high-value, engaging content beyond the typical unboxing. I’d LOVE to showcase [specific product] in a way that highlights its [key feature or benefit], making it feel truly relatable & exciting for my audience!
In exchange for PR, I’d love to provide one of the following:
1 TikTok Post + Tag
1 IG Reel Post + Tag
1 UGC Video with usage rights
3 High-Quality Product Photos
A bit about me:
[PICTURE OF INFO]
I’m all about creative collaborations that actually convert PR into
visibility + engagement.
Would love to make this happen ASAP—let me know what you think!?
[Social media links]
Thanks so much,
[Your Name]
Why This Email Works (And Why Mine Didn’t Before)
Instead of blending into the inbox chaos, this email:
✨
Acknowledges the brand’s perspective
—they’re busy, so I keep it quick.
✨
Feels personal & real
—not robotic or overly formal.
✨
Makes it easy to say yes
—bullet points make the offer clear & compelling.
✨
Positions me as a valuable content partner
—not just someone asking for free stuff.
✨
Creative image—
makes you stand out RIGHT away.
The first time a brand replied with,
“This is exactly the kind of partnership we’re looking for. Let’s do it!”
I literally screamedddd. I’d finally cracked the code!!
And I want you to experience that too 🫶
So, before you send your next brand outreach email, ask yourself:
Does this stand out? Would I reply to this if I were the brand?
If not,
rewrite it.
Make it
bold
. Make it
different
. Make it
irresistible
!!!
This is how you
stop looking like everyone else
—and start getting on PR lists, building real relationships, and turning gifting into paid deals!
You. got. this!!!
Much love,
Fiona
P.S. Try sending this template on Tuesday or Thursday  mornings between 9am-3pm for the highest response rates!!
Unsubscribe
View in browser

from other creators

TikTok Video (It's around the 2 minute mark)

You’ll see images of my beauty brand, Frilliance, on store shelves (so cool ah!!) and some press coverage about it. I started my brand in 2016 and built it brick by brick (lotsss of work lol) it’s very real.
Emails from Influencer Insider

one

Yes

yes

body:
I want your PR so I can promote maam
On Sunday, 18 May 2025, Fiona Frills <fiona@hi.influencerinsider.club> wrote:
Hey!
Since sharing Influencer Insider yesterday, my inbox has been flooded with questions about whether this really going to work for you…
Well rather than telling you what's possible, I'll let the influencer insider girls speak for themselves!! :)
The other day I got the sweetesttt update from one of our OG Influencer Insider girlies and I literally screamed!!
(Umm Fenty, YSL, Wet N Wild… all in one haul?! Stackeddd!!)
Just a few months ago, she was in a totally different spot…
She was putting in effort, creating cute content, reaching out to brands but… barely getting any replies.
She felt so overwhelmed and frustrated, because she was seeing girls with similar content, get brand deals and PR responses.
Then she got our email inviting her to test the Influencer Insider system — and she said, “Why not? What’s the worst that can happen?!”
Fast forward to now… 🤭
She’s getting 3–5 PR packages a WEEK. YAY!
She’s already made over $1,250 in paid brand deals. AMAZING!!
And she has just 6.2k followers!!
Like… are you kidding?! That’s what happens when you believe in yourself and use the right strategy!
Inside Influencer Insider, I break down exactly what she did:
How to find the right brand contacts
Create emails they can’t ignore
Turn PR into paid opportunities
Create content that gets noticed (and reposted!)
I’m not promising overnight success. She showed up, stayed consistent, and followed every step. But she’s proof that it works!!
And guess what? I
know
you can do it too!!
Join Influencer Insider today for a one time payment of $28.00 (not a subscription)— it’s worth WAY more, think of all the success you can absolutely have!
Because this is about
supporting you
— not gatekeeping the industry secrets!! too many gatekeepers in this world!
Click Here To Join Influencer Insider
And I’m ALSO including my personal contact list of 300+ brand emails. Let’s get you on those PR lists & build brand relationships!
Dreams become reality all the time… they did for me, they did for her, and they can for YOU too. 🫶
You got this!!
Much love,
Fiona

subject: Please READ ME Re: Your YSL Beauty & Fenty PR Boxes Are Waiting For You... 📦🎀
body:
Hi doll

Your business is very important to me.

Due to the high volume of inquiries, please allow time for a response.
All emails are answered in the order in which they were received
therefore, multiple emails do result in a longer wait time.

Please note: no emails are answered Friday-Sundays.

Mani Makeup Artist  exclusively provides makeup artistry services.

For all inquiries, please reply with the following information if you
haven’t done so already:

-Full Name
-Occasion (civil, bridal morning, reception, guest of a party, etc)
-Date(s)
- ﻿﻿Time you need to be ready by (per event)
- ﻿﻿Time gap available between events (if booking for multiple events
on the same day)
- ﻿﻿Full location/venue address with postcode where you'll be getting
ready (per event)
This information helps us give you an exact quote.
-Number of ladies requiring makeup artistry services
-Photographers and hairstylists time of arrival

Please note I do not do hair as stated in my bio!

Please note that I am unable to confirm bookings until a 50% booking
fee is received within 48 hours. This is non refundable /
transferable.

Do not opt for Party packages  if you are the bride. I have terminated
bookings in the past for this, so please make sure you book the
correct makeup package otherwise your deposit will be retained after
the termination of your booking.

If any information is missing from your query, your slot will be given
to someone who has provided all of the information required.

For all Blogging, Brand & PR Collaborations
Please allow me 2-3 business days to respond.

Again, thank you for considering Mani Makeup Artist as your makeup
artist of choice.


Love,
Mani
Instagram: @manimakeupartist @mendhimemoriesdecor

body:
Okay! Sounds great! Thank you
Sent from AOL on Android
On Fri, May 16, 2025 at 6:02 PM, Fiona Frills
<fiona@team.influencerinsider.club> wrote:
Hey!
The real reality of being an Influencer, I'm about to get vulnerable with you <3
Before my beauty brand was in CVS and Walmart, before the 1M+ YouTube subscribers...
I was exactly where you might be right now. Right before everything turns around!!
Back in 2013, I spent 3 months creating the
perfect
beauty content.
My lighting was great, my edits were clean, and I was posting consistently.
My follower count was slowly growing, but brands weren't noticing me…
Only the weirdest companies (vacuum companies & gaming apps lolll)
So I did what I thought would work… I sent 47 DMs to beauty brands I loved, each one carefully crafted with compliments about their products.
I was SO excited about the potential PR packages and brand deals headed my way!!
The response??!
Absolutely nothing. Well actually 2 polite rejections.🧍‍♀️
I was sooo confused. I watched other creators with FEWER followers than me unboxing beautiful PR boxes.
What were they doing that I wasn't??!
The turning point came when I accidentally made friends with a PR manager at a event in LA.
After a few phone calls, she confessed something that changed everythinggg for me!!
Later that day, she showed me the email templates her and her team use and ways to find brand contacts!!
SUCH A QUEEN.
And what I saw shocked me—the successful pitches/emails looked NOTHING like what I'd been sending….
I starting using her tips that week:
I found the right email contacts instead of DMing (NOT
Pr@brand.com
either)
I created a visual email that stood out (more tips coming)
I structured my pitch around the brand's needs, not mine
I followed up consistently using her recommended schedule (this worked wonders!!!)
Within 30 days, I received my first PR package from a major brand and had brands wanting to PAY ME!!!
Which was a huge step for me!!
3 months later, my doorstep was flooded with packages, including brands I'd previously been ignored by. 🤭
A year later going on brand trips!!!! (First one was with Emma chamberlain & so many incredible influencers)
The crazy part? The ONLY thing that changed was how I approached brands!!
I'm sharing this because I don't want you to waste months like I did.
In tomorrow's email, I'm sending you a free template that's helped girls in my community land their first PR partnerships!! :)
Your perfectly packaged PR & brand relationships that PAYYY is closer than you think!
Much love,
Fiona
P.S. 2 of my close friends are influencer managers and  90% of influencers approach brands completely wrong. Let's make sure you're in the other 10%!! 🫶

Hello,
Thank you for reaching out. We would love to collaborate with you. We charge a $500 flat rate plus commissions for collaborations. This $500 flat rate will include your choice of one of these two types of videos.
1. Detail shots of the product with a trending sound and showcase product in use.
2. Honest review including unboxing, talking about the products selling points, and how to use it.
In our experience, 90% of our sales have come from videos of us showcasing the product in use, allowing the audience to engage with "TheBaileyBoyz". As our dedicated following enjoys watching the "TheBaileyBoyz" have fun!
I will send the video with my watermark displayed on it' to your email prior to posting for your approval.
Additionally, included in the $500 flat rate is a $50 promotion that I will pay for the video to ensure the video reaches, "at minimum" 10,000 views and optimal sales.
If this is something you're interested in, feel free to reply with details of the product and I will send the invoice.
TheBaileyBoyz DO NOT do any promotions for clothing or jewelry.
Thanks!

subject: Re: From Rejected to Going on Brand Trips (storytime) 🙈
body:
Interested
On Fri, May 16, 2025 at 4:04 PM Fiona Frills <fiona@team.influencerinsider.club> wrote:
Hey!
The real reality of being an Influencer, I'm about to get vulnerable with you <3
Before my beauty brand was in CVS and Walmart, before the 1M+ YouTube subscribers...
I was exactly where you might be right now. Right before everything turns around!!
Back in 2013, I spent 3 months creating the
perfect
beauty content.
My lighting was great, my edits were clean, and I was posting consistently.
My follower count was slowly growing, but brands weren't noticing me…
Only the weirdest companies (vacuum companies & gaming apps lolll)
So I did what I thought would work… I sent 47 DMs to beauty brands I loved, each one carefully crafted with compliments about their products.
I was SO excited about the potential PR packages and brand deals headed my way!!
The response??!
Absolutely nothing. Well actually 2 polite rejections.🧍‍♀️
I was sooo confused. I watched other creators with FEWER followers than me unboxing beautiful PR boxes.
What were they doing that I wasn't??!
The turning point came when I accidentally made friends with a PR manager at a event in LA.
After a few phone calls, she confessed something that changed everythinggg for me!!
Later that day, she showed me the email templates her and her team use and ways to find brand contacts!!
SUCH A QUEEN.
And what I saw shocked me—the successful pitches/emails looked NOTHING like what I'd been sending….
I starting using her tips that week:
I found the right email contacts instead of DMing (NOT
Pr@brand.com
either)
I created a visual email that stood out (more tips coming)
I structured my pitch around the brand's needs, not mine
I followed up consistently using her recommended schedule (this worked wonders!!!)
Within 30 days, I received my first PR package from a major brand and had brands wanting to PAY ME!!!
Which was a huge step for me!!
3 months later, my doorstep was flooded with packages, including brands I'd previously been ignored by. 🤭
A year later going on brand trips!!!! (First one was with Emma chamberlain & so many incredible influencers)
The crazy part? The ONLY thing that changed was how I approached brands!!
I'm sharing this because I don't want you to waste months like I did.
In tomorrow's email, I'm sending you a free template that's helped girls in my community land their first PR partnerships!! :)
Your perfectly packaged PR & brand relationships that PAYYY is closer than you think!
Much love,
Fiona
P.S. 2 of my close friends are influencer managers and  90% of influencers approach brands completely wrong. Let's make sure you're in the other 10%!! 🫶
Unsubscribe
View in browser

subject: Re: The exact email template that lands PR packages & Brand partnerships 📦✨
body:
On Thu, 15 May 2025 at 12:10 AM Fiona Frills <fiona@mail.influencerinsider.club> wrote:
Thank you so much
Hey!
As promised, The exacttt email template that's helped my community members land PR from brands like Glow recipe, Skims, and many more!
Once I talked to my manager friend and imagined myself as the person reading these emails…
As the creator partnerships manager, logging on every day to see hundreds of nearly identical messages.
“Hi, I’m a micro-influencer, I’d love to work with you…”
over and over again. Everything clicked!!!
No wonder I wasn’t getting noticed… my emails looked like the
thousands
they get every month. 🤦‍♀️
So, I changed my ✨ approach ✨. I made my emails
impossible to ignore
—and everything shifted!!
The Email That Finally Worked for me and my community girlies!
Subject:
A PR Collab That’s Actually Worth Your Time
Hey [Brand Rep’s Name],
I know your inbox is packed with PR requests, so I’ll keep this short.
I create high-value, engaging content beyond the typical unboxing. I’d LOVE to showcase [specific product] in a way that highlights its [key feature or benefit], making it feel truly relatable & exciting for my audience!
In exchange for PR, I’d love to provide one of the following:
1 TikTok Post + Tag
1 IG Reel Post + Tag
1 UGC Video with usage rights
3 High-Quality Product Photos
A bit about me:
[PICTURE OF INFO]
I’m all about creative collaborations that actually convert PR into
visibility + engagement.
Would love to make this happen ASAP—let me know what you think!?
[Social media links]
Thanks so much,
[Your Name]
Why This Email Works (And Why Mine Didn’t Before)
Instead of blending into the inbox chaos, this email:
✨
Acknowledges the brand’s perspective
—they’re busy, so I keep it quick.
✨
Feels personal & real
—not robotic or overly formal.
✨
Makes it easy to say yes
—bullet points make the offer clear & compelling.
✨
Positions me as a valuable content partner
—not just someone asking for free stuff.
✨
Creative image—
makes you stand out RIGHT away.
The first time a brand replied with,
“This is exactly the kind of partnership we’re looking for. Let’s do it!”
I literally screamedddd. I’d finally cracked the code!!
And I want you to experience that too 🫶
So, before you send your next brand outreach email, ask yourself:
Does this stand out? Would I reply to this if I were the brand?
If not,
rewrite it.
Make it
bold
. Make it
different
. Make it
irresistible
!!!
This is how you
stop looking like everyone else
—and start getting on PR lists, building real relationships, and turning gifting into paid deals!
You. got. this!!!
Much love,
Fiona
P.S. Try sending this template on Tuesday or Thursday  mornings between 9am-3pm for the highest response rates!!
Unsubscribe

Hey!
As promised, The exacttt email template that's helped my community members land PR from brands like Glow recipe, Skims, and many more!
Once I talked to my manager friend and imagined myself as the person reading these emails…
As the creator partnerships manager, logging on every day to see hundreds of nearly identical messages.
“Hi, I’m a micro-influencer, I’d love to work with you…”
over and over again. Everything clicked!!!
No wonder I wasn’t getting noticed… my emails looked like the
thousands
they get every month. 🤦‍♀️
So, I changed my ✨ approach ✨. I made my emails
impossible to ignore
—and everything shifted!!
The Email That Finally Worked for me and my community girlies!
Subject:
A PR Collab That’s Actually Worth Your Time
Hey [Brand Rep’s Name],
I know your inbox is packed with PR requests, so I’ll keep this short.
I create high-value, engaging content beyond the typical unboxing. I’d LOVE to showcase [specific product] in a way that highlights its [key feature or benefit], making it feel truly relatable & exciting for my audience!
In exchange for PR, I’d love to provide one of the following:
1 TikTok Post + Tag
1 IG Reel Post + Tag
1 UGC Video with usage rights
3 High-Quality Product Photos
A bit about me:
[PICTURE OF INFO]
I’m all about creative collaborations that actually convert PR into
visibility + engagement.
Would love to make this happen ASAP—let me know what you think!?
[Social media links]
Thanks so much,
[Your Name]
Why This Email Works (And Why Mine Didn’t Before)
Instead of blending into the inbox chaos, this email:
✨
Acknowledges the brand’s perspective
—they’re busy, so I keep it quick.
✨
Feels personal & real
—not robotic or overly formal.
✨
Makes it easy to say yes
—bullet points make the offer clear & compelling.
✨
Positions me as a valuable content partner
—not just someone asking for free stuff.
✨
Creative image—
makes you stand out RIGHT away.
The first time a brand replied with,
“This is exactly the kind of partnership we’re looking for. Let’s do it!”
I literally screamedddd. I’d finally cracked the code!!
And I want you to experience that too 🫶
So, before you send your next brand outreach email, ask yourself:
Does this stand out? Would I reply to this if I were the brand?
If not,
rewrite it.
Make it
bold
. Make it
different
. Make it
irresistible
!!!
This is how you
stop looking like everyone else
—and start getting on PR lists, building real relationships, and turning gifting into paid deals!
You. got. this!!!
Much love,
Fiona
P.S. Try sending this template on Tuesday or Thursday  mornings between 9am-3pm for the highest response rates!!

subject: Re: The exact reason why some micro influencers get PR (and others don't) 👀🎀📦
body:
Omg thanks girl this was so helpful btw, sorry for replying late I'm very busy with stuff I hope I can get a reply soon
On Fri, May 9, 2025, 5:45 PM Fiona <fiona@join.influencerinsider.club> wrote:
Heyyy!
As someone who has sent out
thousands
of PR boxes from my brand Frilliance, I wanted to share something that completelyyy changed my perspective as both a brand owner AND an influencer.
There's a clear difference between creators who get PR consistently/paid brand deals and those who don't—and it's not about follower count (crazy i know lol). 👀
Here are the 5 things successful micro influencers (500 to 5,000) DO that get them on tons of PR lists:
DO:
1. Research the right contact person - Never send to generic "info@" emails (they're literally black holes for PR requests a NO NO)
2. Customize each email outreach - Brands can smell a copy-pasted template from miles away🧍‍♀️(it shows brands your not that interested in them)
3. Show specific value - Explain exactly how your content style matches their brand (with screenshot examples to stand out!)
4. Follow up strategically - The magic often happens in the follow-up (I'll share my exact timeline below)
5. Stand out visually - Use design elements (or photos) in your email! That make you instantly memorable!! ✨
And here are the 5 things that get your emails deleted immediately:
DON'T:
1. Focus on follower count - Starting with "I have X followers" screams amateur ah!
2. Write paragraphs about yourself - Brands care about what you can do for THEM 👀
3. Use generic compliments - "I love your brand!" means nothing without specifics details.
4. Send the same message to competitors - Brands talk to each other more than you think…
5. Give up after one attempt - most successful PR partnerships happen after the 2nd or 3rd contact! :)
If you missed my last email with the list of 20 brands actively seeking micro influencers right now,
click here.
Being an influencer (making money & getting PR) is tough, which is why I'm sharing these insider secrets most established creators won't tell you. I've been on both sides of this, and I want to be the guide I wish I had!! Because OH MY… it can be overwhelming.
ALSO Here’s the most successful follow-up schedule I've seen is: first email → wait 5 days → follow-up #1 → wait 7 days → follow-up #2. This simple rhythm has tripled PR acceptance rates for my community members!!
Much love,
Fiona
P.S. In the email i’m going to get raw and real with you and share a story that I think you’ll love 🫶

body:
Hola, mi nombre es Heilen Garcia
Muchas gracias por contactarme para colaborar, me encantaría trabajar contigo!
Actualmente y debido al tamaño de mis seguidores, cobro una tarifa fija y sin modificaciones por video.
Todos mis videos son publicados en TikTok ,Facebook, Instagram y YouTube ya que son mis plataformas principales, proporcionando el link del producto a cada uno de los comentarios, además el enlace de cada producto estará en mi tienda de Amazon y TikTok, si corresponde. No elimino los enlaces una vez publicado el video. Tampoco elimino los videos.
Por acá le envío mis propuestas en PDF. Espero una pronta respuesta.Muchas Gracias y que tenga lindo día!
Heilen Garcia
Creadora de contenido
Limpieza / Hogar / Organización

body:
Dear Chelsea,
Thank you so much for reaching out and for your kind words about my work  I really appreciate it!
The concept behind Tipsy.Chat sounds very exciting, and I’m definitely interested in exploring a paid collaboration with you.
I’d love to hear more about the type of content you’re envisioning, your timeline, and any specific goals you have for this project.
Feel free to share any additional details, and I’m happy to also bring in my own ideas.
Looking forward to hearing from you!
Warm regards,
Chaimae Dikri
